title: Australia in New Guinea
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia - Foreign relations
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Papua New Guinea - Economic conditions
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Papua New Guinea - Politics and government
description: Traces the development of North East New Guinea under mandate to Australia by the League of Nations. The film contrasts conditions in pre-war years with reconstruction and development during recent years; cutting and milling of timber; construction of pre-fabricated houses and other buildings; education of natives; an experimental project for raising sheep, shearing and weaving wool. No other credits available.
